fuck...change wukong to vi then. no one knows how to play wuking anyways. ty for correcting my mistake sir

and zed lb lissandra irelia katarina kalista 

we dont realy lack champions to ban 

ofc when you go and ban only junglers you maybe did something meaningfull, but in the end your lanes can get shredded by champions that are immune to ganks, or enemy can just pick something that synergizes with their jungler better 

that's what banns are for, to cripple the enemy's capability to outpick you or set yourself for better picks 
with suchs a diverse champion pool we can ban whatever we want and we dont even hinder enemy's capability to pick good counters

If you have 8 bans, then everyone will complain about the 9th strongest champion and how unfair they are. If you have 10 bans, everyone will complain about how little counterplay the currently 11th strongest champion has. How about we just get 123 bans and uninstall the game instead?

DOTA 2 I believe also has 4 bans per team (8 total), same as Smite. 
DOTA 2 also only has a Roster of 110 characters. 
Smite has only a Roster of 68.
League of Legends currently has a Roster of 123 and only 3 bans per team (6 total).

I agree 100% with you in that it should be bumped up from 6 to 8. As it is currently affecting the Quality of Life when it comes to draft/ranked play.
